name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Ray of Jewelry【#ホロ0期生ライブ2024】 [AUu9pSkkgaY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: The group performs their representative song "Dream☆Story" together on stage.
The members gather for their first MC segment, greeting the audience and introducing the event's hashtag.

subtitles.original: ふと忘れてしまいたくなる
subtitles.english: I feel like I might accidentally forget

subtitles.original: 昨日のあの記憶のピースね
subtitles.english: Those pieces of yesterday's memories

subtitles.original: 失くしたりはできそうもないけど
subtitles.english: It doesn't seem like I can lose them

subtitles.original: うまく繋げばまた続きへ
subtitles.english: But if I connect them well, they'll lead to what's next

subtitles.original: でも今は関係ないんだよ
subtitles.english: But that doesn't matter right now

subtitles.original: そんなことも忘れちゃおよな
subtitles.english: Let's just forget about all that

subtitles.original: 不思議な世界にアクセル全開で
subtitles.english: With the accelerator floored into a mysterious world

subtitles.original: 飛び込もうよ一緒に
subtitles.english: Let's dive in together

subtitles.original: でもでも急ぎっぱなしは禁物で
subtitles.english: But but, rushing all the time is a no-no

subtitles.original: 急がば回ってるっていうくらいじゃ
subtitles.english: Better safe than sorry, as they say

subtitles.original: だからたまにはゆっくりひと休み
subtitles.english: So let's take a slow break once in a while

subtitles.original: したらそれじゃそよ風のリズムで
subtitles.english: And then go with the rhythm of the breeze

subtitles.original: 止まらねぇぞ！
subtitles.english: We won't stop!

subtitles.original: 飛んでけハイ！大きく息を吸ったら
subtitles.english: Fly away, high! Take a deep breath

subtitles.original: 僕らのストーリーが今溢れ出すよ
subtitles.english: And our story starts overflowing now

subtitles.original: もっともっと大きくね
subtitles.english: Bigger and bigger

subtitles.original: 最初が肝心なんです！
subtitles.english: The beginning is crucial!

subtitles.original: はじめまして、こんにちは！せーの
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you, hello! One, two...

subtitles.original: ホロライブだよ！
subtitles.english: It's Hololive!

subtitles.original: もう一度ハイ！そら遠くまで届け
subtitles.english: Once more, high! Reach out far into the sky

subtitles.original: ドキドキまで奇想天外に彩っていく Dream☆Story
subtitles.english: Unexpectedly, even to the heartbeat, painting our Dream☆Story

subtitles.original: やっぱ一秒たりとも目を離さないで欲しいな
subtitles.english: As expected, I don't want you to look away for even a second

subtitles.original: まばたきもしてらんない
subtitles.english: Can't even blink

subtitles.original: ああ ほらね 最高でしょ？ イェイ！
subtitles.english: Ah, see? It's the best, right? Yay!

subtitles.original: 一歩進めばまた後ろへ
subtitles.english: Step forward, then back again

subtitles.original: 見えない力が邪魔している
subtitles.english: An invisible force is getting in the way

subtitles.original: ジャンプしたりできたらいいけれど
subtitles.english: It'd be nice if I could jump over it

subtitles.original: それも愛嬌　どうぞよろしく
subtitles.english: But that's just part of the charm, so please bear with me

subtitles.original: でも今は関係ないんだよ
subtitles.english: But that doesn't matter right now

subtitles.original: 心響くリズムを辿れば
subtitles.english: If we follow the rhythm that resonates in our hearts

subtitles.original: 不思議な世界の続きのページで
subtitles.english: On the next page of this mysterious world

subtitles.original: また出会えたね Destiny
subtitles.english: We've met again, it's destiny

subtitles.original: もしもし遅めのテンポもいいけど
subtitles.english: Hello, a slow tempo is fine too

subtitles.original: 今はそんな場合じゃないわけじゃない？
subtitles.english: But isn't right now not the time for that?

subtitles.original: だけど大丈夫、一息ついたのならさ
subtitles.english: But it's okay, if you've caught your breath

subtitles.original: いちにのさんの合図で
subtitles.english: On the count of three

subtitles.original: いちにのさん！
subtitles.english: One, two, three!

subtitles.original: 飛んでけハイ！大きな声で叫んだら
subtitles.english: Fly away, high! If you shout out loud

subtitles.original: 僕らのストーリーが今紡がれてく
subtitles.english: Our story will be woven together now

subtitles.original: もっともっと大きくね
subtitles.english: Bigger and bigger

subtitles.original: ボリュームはMAXで！
subtitles.english: With the volume at max!

subtitles.original: はじめまして、こんにちは！せーの
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you, hello! One, two...

subtitles.original: ホロライブだよ！
subtitles.english: It's Hololive!

subtitles.original: もう一度ハイ！そら遠くまで響け
subtitles.english: Once more, high! Resonate far into the sky

subtitles.original: はちゃめちゃで摩訶不思議にきらめいたんだ Dream☆Story
subtitles.english: Messily and mysteriously, it sparkled, our Dream☆Story

subtitles.original: やっぱ一秒たりとも体感してたいの
subtitles.english: As expected, I want to experience every single second

subtitles.original: くらくらしちゃうくらい
subtitles.english: So much it makes me dizzy

subtitles.original: ああ だけど最高じゃない？
subtitles.english: Ah, but isn't it the best?

subtitles.original: ねえねえテンション 高まってアテンション
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, tension, rising, attention!

subtitles.original: ワクワク警報は鳴り止まない
subtitles.english: The excitement alarm won't stop ringing

subtitles.original: ねえねえテンション 高まってアテンション
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, tension, rising, attention!

subtitles.original: 誰も止められないわ！
subtitles.english: Nobody can stop us!

subtitles.original: 飛んでけハイ！大きく息を吸ったら
subtitles.english: Fly away, high! Take a deep breath

subtitles.original: 僕らのストーリーが今溢れ出すよ
subtitles.english: And our story starts overflowing now

subtitles.original: もっともっと大きくね
subtitles.english: Bigger and bigger

subtitles.original: 最初が肝心なんです！
subtitles.english: The beginning is crucial!

subtitles.original: これからもさ、よろしくね！せーの
subtitles.english: From now on too, please treat us well! One, two...

subtitles.original: ホロライブだよ！
subtitles.english: It's Hololive!

subtitles.original: 最後はハイ！そら遠くまで届け
subtitles.english: Last one, high! Reach out far into the sky

subtitles.original: ドキドキまで奇想天外に彩ったんだ Dream☆Story
subtitles.english: Unexpectedly, even to the heartbeat, we've painted our Dream☆Story

subtitles.original: やっぱ一秒たりとも目を離さないで欲しいな
subtitles.english: As expected, I don't want you to look away for even a second

subtitles.original: まばたきもしてらんない
subtitles.english: Can't even blink

subtitles.original: ああ ほらね 最高でしょ？ イェイ！
subtitles.english: Ah, see? It's the best, right? Yay!

subtitles.original: みんなー、集合ー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, gather 'round!

subtitles.original: 0期生ライブ、始まりましたー！
subtitles.english: The 0th Gen Live has begun!

subtitles.original: 本日のハッシュタグはこちら！
subtitles.english: Today's hashtag is this!

subtitles.original: たくさんポストしてください！
subtitles.english: Please post a lot!

subtitles.original: そしてステージも見てー！
subtitles.english: And look at the stage too!
